interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: OUTRE TIMELESS PINEAPPLE PONY - SWEETIE #S1B/30
Review Date: 2020/02/16
Store: Outre
Product Description: ['Outre Synthetic Hair Ponytail Timeless Pineapple Ponytail Sweetie', 'TIMELESS PINEAPPLE PONYTAIL', "Pick your curl pattern and get an instant curly updo with timeless Ponytail's Pineapple Drawstring. These curly puffs feature gorgeous curls that fall down your forehead for an effortlessly tousled look. Innovatively designed with a clip to attach to the front of your hairline, and a drawstring to attach to your hair, Timeless Ponytail's Pineapple Drawstring was made for the stylish woman on-the-go.", 'HOW TO WEAR', 'Brush your hair back into a high bun.', 'Brush your hair back into a high bun.', 'Attach the piece to your own bun, and pull the drawstring so that it is securely fastened.', 'Attach the piece to your own bun, and pull the drawstring so that it is securely fastened.', 'Extend the front of the piece forward and clip it just behind your hairline, so that the curls fall loosely down your forehead.', 'Extend the front of the piece forward and clip it just behind your hairline, so that the curls fall loosely down your forehead.', 'Fluff the curls, and go!', 'Fluff the curls, and go!', 'Tip:For a more voluminous look, pull your hair up into an even higher bun.', 'Tip:For a more voluminous look, pull your hair up into an even higher bun.']
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Color': '1', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Outre', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.75 x 6 x 2.75 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '827298792468', 'Manufacturer': 'OUTRE'}
Review Text: I had to send this product back received it all fuzzy Did not look anything as advertised
Review Title: Return to Vendor
Rating: 1.0

profile:
The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality, unprocessed hair products that allow for styling and customization, particularly valuing Brazilian virgin hair for its versatility in creating various hairstyles, including wigs. Their interest in body wave textures reflects a desire for a natural appearance and manageable options. Recently, the user purchased a professional tool for enhancing their hairdressing skills, indicating a commitment to pursuing hair-related activities more seriously, whether for personal use or to assist others.

However, the user’s recent experience with a synthetic hair product was disappointing; the product did not meet their expectations, prompting a return. This negative interaction highlights their continued emphasis on quality and performance, as they articulate dissatisfaction when products fall short of advertised standards. Overall, the user values quality, versatility, and functionality in their hair products, combining both personal enjoyment and community-oriented experiences in their interactions. They appear to prioritize items that deliver on their promises and support their creative hair styling endeavors, reaffirming their commitment to high standards in hair care and styling.
